budget.headline: Conoce las necesidades clave de esta campaña y descubre cómo tu apoyo puede hacer realidad este proyecto.

about.description: Goteo belongs to the Platoniq Foundation. By collaborating on a campaign, your money will be safeguarded by Platoniq and donated to Climática if the success goals are met.

impact.description: By collaborating with a project promoted on Goteo, you can request a donation certificate. Thus, you can deduct up to 80% of what you have contributed in your next tax return.

ShareButton.title: Spread this project around the world
ShareButton.description: You can copy the link to send it and also share it on Facebook or X. You can even copy a code snippet to insert a campaign banner on another website. Make it go further!

page.title: Tell us your personal information
page.description: We need to know who you are before payment.
page.goteoUserInfo: If you are already a Goteo user, log in. You can use your wallet to make these donations.

form.policiesCheckbox: By registering I confirm my acceptance of your terms of use, privacy policy and cookie policy.

zod.taxId.custom: Tax ID must be at least 8 characters long
zod.legalName.custom: Legal name is required for organizations

password.minLength: *Requisitos de la contraseña: debe tener 8 caracteres

individual.taxIdCheckbox: I want to deduct this donation. It is necessary to provide the ID number to inform the tax authorities.

organization.taxIdDescription: *With the Tax ID we will notify the tax agency for your income tax return.

hero.title: Finance the change the world needs
hero.description: We are embarking on a new phase with the same guiding principles that have led us since the beginning: promoting projects that transform the world through social justice, democratic participation, and the defense of human rights and ecosystems. Join a community that makes a real difference. Be part of the solution!

renovationBanner.title: We're renovating Goteo!
renovationBanner.description: Goteo has built a unique story in the world of crowdfunding. Do you want to continue being part of it?

checkout.title: Summary of your selected donations
checkout.subtitle: Here are the ones you've selected. Press the "continue" button to proceed with the payment.

reward.claimed: people have already claimed this reward
reward.unclaimed: No one has claimed this reward yet. Be the first!

blog.title: Big changes are coming... don't miss anything!
blog.excerpt: A process that involves an important technical migration of the current platform, and to do it with all security guarantees and without loss of information, we need to carry out an orderly transition, with key dates for the publication of campaigns and donations...

matchfunding.title: Matchfunding
matchfunding.description: The matching donation feature is unique to Goteo. Since 2013, we have been looking for organizations that want to amplify the impact of crowdfunding. For every euro that an individual donates to a Goteo campaign, a partner institution (foundation, public administration, company, etc.) contributes the same amount, or even more.

impact.title: Impact data
impact.description: Matchfunding not only multiplies financial resources, but also generates tangible social impact. Essentially, match funding transforms small donations into significant impact, validating projects with community support and optimizing public and private resources.

cards.viewCampaigns: See the campaigns of the call

theoryToAction.title: From theory to action
theoryToAction.subtitle: The figures that reveal our real footprint.

whyGoteo.title: Why Goteo?
whyGoteo.subtitle: We have values ​​and the data support us.

stories.title: Goteo launches new website!
stories.subtitle: Delighted to share it with you
stories.description:
Goteo has a new face! Browse through our renewed website and discover a more intuitive and attractive social crowdfunding experience. Explore innovative projects, meet the creators behind them and join our community.
Become a donor and make your ideas come true!

firstCampaign.title: How do I make my first campaign?
firstCampaign.description: Your project deserves to take off: Master social crowdfunding with our FREE TOOLKIT. Practical guide + downloadable templates to conquer your audience.

testimonials.title: Testimonials from our promoters
testimonials.description: Who can tell you better what it's like to drive successful campaigns? Our promoters tell us first-hand what it's like to manage a campaign with Goteo.
